mapper.select: SELECT RESULT.PARENT_NAME, RESULT.REVIEW_NUMBER, RESULT.REVIEW_CONTENT, RESULT.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, RESULT.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, RESULT.PARENT_NUMBER, RESULT.CLASS_NUMBER, RESULT.CLASS_NAME FROM ( SELECT PA.PARENT_NAME, RE.REVIEW_NUMBER, RE.REVIEW_CONTENT, RE.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, RE.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, RE.PARENT_NUMBER, RE.CLASS_NUMBER, RE.CLASS_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RE.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE) AS RN FROM( SELECT R.REVIEW_NUMBER, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, R.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, R.PARENT_NUMBER, R.CLASS_NUMBER, DETAIL.CLASS_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER AND P.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber} ) DETAIL JOIN REVIEW R ON DETAIL.CLASS_NUMBER = R.CLASS_NUMBER ) RE JOIN PARENT PA ON RE.PARENT_NUMBER = PA.PARENT_NUMBER ) RESULT WHERE RESULT.RN <= 3

SELECT pr.PRO_REPORT_NUMBER, pr.PRO_REPORT_CONTENT, pr.PRO_REPORT_REGISTER_DATE, pr.PRO_POST_NUMBER, pp.PRO_NUMBER, pp.PRO_POST_TITLE FROM pro_report pr LEFT JOIN pro_post pp ON pr.PRO_POST_NUMBER = pp.PRO_POST_NUMBER WHERE pp.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, PRO_INFO.* FROM ( SELECT P.PRO_NUMBER, P.PRO_EMAIL, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, P.PRO_FILE, P.PRO_INTRO FROM PRO P ) PRO_INFO WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT P.PRO_NUMBER) FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER JOIN REVIEW R ON C.CLASS_NUMBER = R.CLASS_NUMBER WHERE R.CLASS_NUMBER IS NOT NULL
